sn27.1:4.2: “Mendicants, desire and greed for the eye,
sn27.1:4.7: or mind is a corruption of the mind.
sn27.1:4.8: When a mendicant has given up mental corruption in these six cases, their mind inclines to renunciation.
sn27.1:4.9: A mind imbued with renunciation is declared to be capable of directly knowing anything that can be realized.”
